sentences.english: Yes, we must suppose the faults of the niece to have been those of the aunt;
sentences.chinese: 是的，我們必須把侄女的過錯視爲嬸母的過錯。

sentences.english: ''We thought she was dead,'' the aunt said through a shower of tears.
sentences.chinese: “我們以爲她死了，”嬸母說着，淚如雨下。

sentences.english: He has (got) an aunt and an uncle.
John robbed his old aunt blind for years .
sentences.chinese: 約翰多年來騙取了他嬸母很多錢。
